summary:
An urban area is a place where many people live and work, usually with lots of buildings and infrastructure. It's like a big city or town. The world's largest urban area is Tokyo, Japan, with around 40 million people.

These areas are important as they help shape our civilization and daily lives. They started to form thousands of years ago, leading to the development of cities and modern planning. Urban areas contrast with rural places like villages and are key to understanding human impact on the environment.
title: Urban area
